transcript: I heard this guy say this it's been like ingrained in my head so much so that whenever I don't want to do something this is the actual phrase that comes in my head boys are confident men are certain the other thing is he's like it's not about doing your best it's about doing what's required and whenever I have a hard thing like I'm like iing make more videos for Content or whatever I don't want to do this podcast or whatever it is literally my immediate thought that's like my subconscious is like I will do what's required
